overview: A nocturnal journey through the English countryside is imagined through the lenses of a succession of CCTV cameras. The work sleepwalks through a series of empty lanes and meadows, and a sense that all is well with the world prevails until the eerie emptiness of a dual carriageway shifts the mood from benign slumber to postapocalyptic anxiety. Available on Vimeo as a seven-minute three-screen version.
title: CCTV Monitor 1
